title: (Wed Early Bird) Bobby Gives An Update After Stanley's ACL Surgery + Listener Wants To Take His Wife's Last Name + We Play 'Name This Famous Country Band'
itunes:title: (Wed Early Bird) Bobby Gives An Update After Stanley's ACL Surgery + Listener Wants To Take His Wife's Last Name + We Play 'Name This Famous Country Band'
description:
We start the morning by getting an update from Bobby about how Stanley is doing post ACL surgery. Find out what happened that made him really angry... Plus, we give advice to a listener whose family is mad at him because he wants to take his wife's last name instead of being traditional and she takes his last name when they get married. Then, we play "Name This Famous Country Band," Lunchbox and a caller team up to guess the right answer!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
